message: I'm excited to offer you this great opportunity to purchase a valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15,000. This is a fair price considering its worth to me is significantly higher.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but $15,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product. This is a fair price considering my budget and the value I place on the item.

I understand that $15,000 is a bit steep for you, but $8,500 is also below my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle and sell the product to you for $12,000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider.
